data.message: Thank you Mr. Presidet Barack Obama. I am so afraid that you and V.P Joe Biden, will soon be leaving Te White House, you two Gentlemen have workedso hard for so long, and have achieved so much,. I know for this day and time we have to have good-hearted, & intelligent people like you. I am bothered about what will happen when you leave, it is very sad, I will deeply miss both of you and your lovely familie's, Thank you for everything. I'm so sad and afraid.
